data.title: Solstice Gold Corp closes upsized private placement, raising $1.1 million through issuance of common shares in Ontario at $0.085.
data.description: Solstice Gold Corp., a company based in Vancouver, British Columbia, has successfully concluded a private placement financing known as the Offering. The company raised about $1.1 million through this initiative by issuing common shares called Ontario FT Shares. These shares were priced at $0.085 per share and were specifically offered to residents in Ontario. Each Ontario FT Share qualifies as a flow-through share for specific tax purposes.

data.title: NUBURU invests $1.5 million in Orbit, acquiring 10.7% equity, advancing defense & security platform in multi-billion-dollar market.
data.description: NUBURU, Inc. (NYSE American: BURU), a leader in blue-laser technology for defense and security applications, has successfully completed the first phase of acquiring Orbit S.r.l. Nuburu Defense LLC has invested $1.5 million in Orbit, obtaining a 10.7% stake in the company. Orbit is known for its high-quality defense-grade software as a service (SaaS) solutions. This strategic move will strengthen NUBURU's position in the market and enhance its capabilities in advancing defense and security technologies.

data.title: Schneider Electric Canada promotes decarbonization with advanced tech, citing Kassø plant in Denmark as benchmark.
data.description: In Mississauga, Ontario, Schneider Electric Canada is demonstrating how its advanced automation and energy management solutions can aid in Canada's efforts to decarbonize heavy industry and achieve its 2050 net-zero goals. The company highlights examples like the Kassø Power-to-X facility in Denmark, the world's initial commercial-scale e-methanol plant utilizing Schneider Electric technology. This technology showcase aims to support industrial transformation and foster a clean fuel economy.
Jensen Huang, next destination UK Luton Airport… scheduled to depart by private jet

data.title: Bank of America pledges $250M to address hunger & basic needs, including $5M for immediate assistance in communities.
data.description: Bank of America has unveiled a five-year commitment totaling $250 million to aid families in local communities across the U.S. Immediate assistance of $5 million will be provided to families in need. The announcement was made in Charlotte, N.C. on Oct. 31, 2025.
EU DEBATES ‘IN-KIND’ CHINA TARIFF TO ENSURE CRITICAL MATERIALS

data.title: Oil States Intl (OIS) Q3 2025: Revenues $165,180k, Operating income $4,748k, Net income $1,900k. Declines in profits.
data.description: In the latest financial report released by Oil States International, Inc. (NYSE: OIS), for the three months ending September 30, 2025, key figures demonstrated some shifts. The company reported consolidated revenues of $165,180 thousand, showing a slight decrease compared to $165,406 thousand in the previous quarter ending June 30, 2025, and a 5% decrease from $174,348 thousand for the same period last year, September 30, 2024. Operating income (loss) was $4,748 thousand for the current quarter, down 10% from the previous quarter's $5,277 thousand and a significant improvement from the -$11,041 thousand reported for the same period last year. Net income (loss) for the quarter stood at $1,900 thousand, which was a 32% drop from the previous quarter's $2,811 thousand and a substantial recovery from the -$14,349 thousand reported a year ago. The detailed financial statement of the company portrays a varied performance over different periods.

data.title: NiSource sets up $1.5 billion at-the-market equity issuance program through 2028, partnering with Barclays and BMO Capital Markets.
data.description: NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI) has unveiled an "at-the-market" equity offering program where it can sell shares of its common stock, valued at $0.01 per share, with a total gross sales amount reaching $1.5 billion until December 31, 2028. The Offering involves individual agreements with Barclays Capital Inc., BMO Capital Markets, and other entities. This initiative aims to raise capital and enhance financial flexibility for NiSource moving forward.
Bitcoin Bancorp officially changes its name to Bitcoin Bancorp with new trading symbol "BCBC" after FINRA approval.

data.title: AYR Wellness starts restructuring process with Summit Noteholders through foreclosure sale for operations across 6 states.
data.description: AYR Wellness Inc. announces a debt restructuring process involving a foreclosure sale conducted by Odyssey Trust Company for senior noteholders. The sale involves certain collateral assets and equity interests of AYR subsidiaries in Florida, New Jersey, Nevada, Ohio, Massachusetts, and Pennsylvania. The process is part of a July 2025 Restructuring Support Agreement and is directed by Senior Noteholders holding a majority of outstanding senior notes. Notifications of disposition were delivered according to the Uniform Commercial Code, published in the Wall Street Journal, and distributed via Cannabis Business Times.

data.title: Soda Health rebrands as Evermore, focusing on outcomes in benefits admin. Leader in Smart Benefits, reflects mandate.
data.description: The top benefits administration platform, Soda Health, has undergone a rebranding and now operates under the name evermore. This company focuses on achieving outcomes in the field.

data.title: Formerly known as EVAI, Vehicle Management Systems rebrands with AI focus; David Prusinski & Muffi Ghadiali join executive team.
data.description: Experienced industry professionals David Prusinski and Muffi Ghadiali have recently joined the executive team to enhance the company's leadership vision. Prusinski brings over 20 years of experience to the team, while Ghadiali has a robust background of 15 years in the industry. Their addition aims to infuse fresh perspectives and solidify the leadership direction of the company. This move showcases the company's commitment to leveraging the expertise of seasoned professionals to drive success.

data.title: US economy's resilience hinges on labor market recovery from hiring slowdown amid government shutdown.
data.description: The strength of President Donald Trump's economy moving forward hinges on the labor market recovering from a concerning decrease in hiring.
Sutro Biopharma plans operational changes to extend funds through milestones, aiming to enhance finances.

data.title: Conifer Holdings rebrands as Presurance Holdings, Inc. Effective Sept. 30, 2025. Reflects company's evolution for the future.
data.description: In Troy, Michigan on September 29, 2025, Conifer Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: CNFR) disclosed that starting September 30, 2025, the Company will be rebranded as Presurance Holdings, Inc. This transformation signals the Company's growth and sets the stage for its future endeavors.

data.title: Inspira appoints Mike Hershkovitz as VP of Global Sales and Sivan Matza as new board member. Ms. Matza succeeds Ms. Rosen.
data.description: In Ra'anana, Israel on October 21, 2025, Inspira™ Technologies OXY B.H.N. Ltd. (NASDAQ: IINN), a renowned company in life-support and diagnostic technologies, revealed significant leadership changes. Mr. Mike Hershkovitz was appointed as the Vice President of Global Sales, enhancing Inspira's global commercial presence. Additionally, Ms. Sivan Matza joined the Board of Directors, chosen as an independent director until the next annual shareholder meeting. Ms. Matza will also participate in the Board's compensation, audit, and financial statement examination committees. This move follows Ms. Limor Rosen's decision to resign from her position on the Board.

data.title: Healthcare consulting leader Huntzinger Management Group rebrands to Avarion, reflecting evolution and maintaining trusted expertise.
data.description: A healthcare consulting leader based in Dunmore, Pennsylvania, Huntzinger Management Group, has officially rebranded to Avarion on September 29, 2025. The company’s transformation aims to signify its growth and increased concentration in the industry, preserving the reliable skills and alliances that have been integral to its achievements. This shift reflects their commitment to progression while continuing to build upon the established reputation.

data.title: Comscore reduces senior capital, eliminates preferred dividend burden, enhances stockholder alignment in recapitalization.
data.description: Decreases senior capital, removes preferred dividend burden, and improves alignment among stockholders.
Former First Deputy Minister of Industry and Trade of the Russian Federation Vasily Osmakov has become the new Deputy Minister of Defense of the Russian Federation, Belousov reported.
